channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Footpath street lamp not working, 19th December
item.description:
See photos. This is a dark footpath (39) towards Barnehurst railway station along the railway line with a light out. Lampost 19 T4. No lighting makes an already unpleasant footpath at night feel even more unsafe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): FP39, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Anerley Road SE20 streetlight column ID number 30 –, 19th December
item.description:
Anerley Road SE20 streetlight column ID number 30 – next to Ridsdale Road junction has a polycarbonate flyposters plastic zip tied to it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Road, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: Oakfield Road SE20 8QA outside numb - green box, 19th December
item.description:

item.title: Disgusting filthy corridor, 19th December
item.description:
This corridor is never cleaned! I keep on reporting it and it keeps on saying that it has been resolved it has not been resolved. The place is filthy. It’s absolutely disgusting that we have to live like this. The monthly clean has not been. Shame on you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mead Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 piles of furniture and several bin bags along the street, 19th December
item.description:
Neighbours have been fly tipping across the street, including several pieces of abandoned furniture, and a number of bin bags. One bin bag, which contains several dangerous items such as nails and used condoms, has been split outside my house.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heyworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
